column1: Opening For Recruitment Executive/ Talent Acquisition
column2: The opportunity :Is To ensure success as a talent acquisition executive, you should possess extensive experience as a recruiter and the ability to attract the perfect candidate for each role. Accomplished talent acquisition specialists are attuned to the hiring needs of their company and contribute to its success by hiring talented and reliable candidates. In this role, you will be responsible for determining job requirements, screening candidates, and forecasting hiring needs. You may also be required to promote company's brand with recruitment initiatives and events. Key responsibilities include: 1.   Strategic responsibilities: -  Utilize& Manage applicant tracking system for internal records and daily updates. Utilising various communication channels to understand candidate experiences, expectations, and cultural fitment for Evolute group Orchestrate campus recruitment drives for full time freshers and interns hirings. Keeping up to date on      current employment legislation and regulations and enforcing them within      the company. Providing recruitment      reports/Updates to Hiring Managers on regular basis. Functional responsibilities: - Preparation of Job Description based on mandates / specifications provided by the Hiring Managers/Hods of various department. Sourcing matching profiles using various unconventional techniques using Job Boards, Job  Postings, social media, company career page, Head Hunting, References, Professional Network, Digital platforms, internal employee referrals etc., Screening and validating candidates to ensure the best quality through robust interviewing techniques. Documentation of the interviews for the ease of decision making. Communicate with the Candidates and Hiring Manager for the interview schedules and feedbacks. Conducting Background/Reference check/ Psychometric/Aptitude test Organize and attend job fairs and recruitment events.  Follow up with the selected candidates, sending offer letters &ensure their joining. Maintaining systematic and comprehensive reports on daily, weekly, monthly tasks. Maintain& Upload candidates database in Recruitment Module of HRMS. To qualify for the role, you must have: - Bachelor?? Degree in Human Resources, IT, Business, or related degree. MBA??Rwill be added advantage. 2-3years of recruiting experience preferred in corporate sector or recruitment consultancy  Must have proven experience either in Tech Hiring (IT) or Non-TechHiring. (Non -IT). Strong Communication& Negotiations Skills. Headhunting & Middle level hiring is preferred Recruitment & Selection, MS Word, MS Excel and Internet Browsing, Social Networking, Email and Phone Etiquettes. Personal Attribute, if any: Proactive, Zeal for learning, Self-Motivated Key attributes for success : - Ability to attract, engage, and assess best-in-class talents in a highly competitive environment Good at Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and web-based systems (applicant tracking systems, etc.). Developing hiring strategies and procedures in line with industry trends, as well as keeping informed of advancements in the field. Willingness to learn and overcome daily challenges in a fast-paced environmentand consistently meet hiring deadlines Maintain up-to-date industry knowledge by participating in educational opportunities, reading professional publications, and maintaining personal networks. Previous experience developing and executing recruiting marketing and branding strategies You will earn brownie points if you have : - Ability to speak knowledgeably about the company and answer any questions a potential hire may have Firm understanding and implementation of recruiting metrics to drive decision-making is strongly preferred  Proficient in using company software and databases to connect with and reach out to potential candidates Experience working with a diverse team and striving for fairness in hiring all races, genders, and ages. Ability to manage a wide range of relationships with a variety of stakeholders

column2: Position Title: HR Executive and Recruitment Professional  Location: Pimple Nilakh  Company:  Propinn Venture Llp Overview: We are seeking a dynamic and experienced HR Executive and Recruitment Professional to join our real estate firm. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing various HR functions and leading the recruitment efforts to attract and retain top talent within the organization. This role requires excellent communication skills, strong attention to detail, and a proactive approach to HR and recruitment. Key Responsibilities: 1.Recruitment:   Develop and implement recruitment strategies to attract qualified candidates for various positions within the company. Source candidates through various channels such as job boards, social media, networking, and employee referrals. Screen resumes and conduct initial interviews to assess candidate qualifications and fit for the organization. Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers and candidates. Manage the offer process, including negotiating salary and benefits packages. Ensure a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process. 2.  On boarding and Orientation: Facilitate the onboarding process for new hires, including conducting orientation sessions and assisting with paperwork completion. Coordinate with different departments to ensure new employees have the necessary resources and information to succeed in their roles. Follow up with new hires to ensure a smooth transition and address any concerns or questions they may have. 3.HR Administration: Maintain accurate and up-to-date employee records in the HRIS system. Process employee paperwork related to hiring, promotions, transfers, and terminations. Assist with the development and implementation of HR policies and procedures. Provide guidance and support to employees on HR-related matters, including benefits, policies, and procedures. Employee Relations: Act as a point of contact for employee inquiries and concerns, and escalate issues as necessary. Conduct investigations into employee complaints or grievances and recommend appropriate resolutions. Promote a positive work environment and company culture through employee engagement initiatives and events. 4.Compliance: Ensure compliance with all relevant employment laws and regulations. Stay up-to-date on changes to employment legislation and communicate any updates to management and employees. Assist with HR audits and compliance reviews as needed. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience working in HR and recruitment roles, preferably in the real estate industry. Knowledge of employment laws and regulations. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent organizational and time management abilities. Ability to handle sensitive and confidential information with discretion.

column2: Role: Sr Executive - Talent Acquisition Location: Goregaon, W - Mumbai, Work from office Timings: General shift Working Days: 5 days About us: Crimson Interactive We are proud to be recognized as a Great Place to Work certified organization. Crimson is globally recognized as a trusted partner for scientific and corporate communications. With an extensive global presence and 10 international offices, we address a wide range of requirements for a diverse, global clientele through our suite of solutions. Job Description   Major Responsibilities You would be responsible for all IT hiring /Non IT end to end of the recruiting cycle of the hiring process from sourcing to on boarding. Use niche platforms to hire and source talent for different roles. Coordinating with department/team heads on manpower requirements and future hiring needs Ability to identify new hiring trends and platform to hire the right talent. Designing and implementing the overall recruitment strategy for each open position. Own the global candidate generation responsibility by developing and deploying strategic talent attraction initiatives Partner with the HR management team on actions, as appropriate, to address competitive gaps Foster innovation through research and exploration of new solutions; institute initiatives to improve/extend capability and ensure all tools/software/platforms fully support recruiting processes Monitoring and applying recruitment best practices Sourcing and attracting candidates, using databases, social media, job portals, etc Ability to communicate on email with candidates and business. Should possess excellent strong verbal and written communication skills Providing analytical and well-documented recruitment reports, when needed Acting as a point of contact and building influential candidate relationships during the selection process Keeping track of all applicants as well as keeping applicants informed on the application process. Preparing offers and conducting offer discussions, issuing appointment letters, etc. Perform reference checks on potential employees Mapping and documenting of all processes related to the recruitment function Pre-requisites/key characteristics and skills required 2 plus years of experience in hiring. A strong understanding of the recruitment cycle Hands-on experience with various selection processes, including background checks Excellent knowledge in MSExcel, Word, and PowerPoint Excellent English communication skills, both verbal and written Familiarity with HR databases, Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS), and Candidate Management Systems is a preference Good interpersonal and decision-making skills. If you have the qualifications and experience we're looking for and are excited about the opportunity to work with a dynamic team in a growing industry, we'd love to hear from you.   Whats in it for you?   1.  Global exposure:  Crimson has employees belonging to more than 125 countries. Opportunity wot work with different Talent with different expertise and backgrounds under one roof. There is always something new to do and something challenging to work on. Hard work, perseverance, and the eagerness to learn are all that our Crimsonites need to flourish at Crimson! 2.  Growth & Benefits : Growth to us is learning something new every day. We not only provide role-specific grooming and training but also various opportunities and platforms for our people to develop their skill and personalities, personally and professionally. 3.  Culture & Diversity : Our team comprises Freshers and experienced professionals from India, Japan, Taiwan, Korea, China, USA, UK, Colombia, Italy, Kazakhstan, etc. Crimsons culture helps each one feel a valuable part of a bigger team, while retaining their individual beliefs and culture. 4.  Our Ideologies, Our Beliefs:  To us, growth is synonymous with progression, and our efforts are kindled to offer empowerment and flexibility to each one of us to share, learn, and grow. Our programs and culture assure our Crimsonites of all elements required to build a strong and successful long-term career. In all that we offer to our Crimsonites, there are four main ideologies and beliefs that form the framework to the benefits we provide  FLEXIBILITY | COMPETITIVE COMPENSATION | JOB SECURITY | PROFESSIONAL & FINANCIAL GROWTH   Know about our Culture: Crimsons  Culture nurtures Crimsonites to give their best and become the greatest version of themselves, personally and professionally.We offer a secure, safe, and rewarding ecosystem to establish a successful long-term career.In a nutshell, Crimsons culture empowers everyone to speak freely, learn passionately, work flexibly, and grow fearlessly.Lets take a closer look at some of the pillars of our Culture! Open Communication | Meritocracy | Creative Thinking | Keeping it Light | Customer Centricity | I am Crimson Awards and Recognition: Consistently ranked among the Best Employer brand awards  National BEST EMPLOYER Brands ??2021, ??SIA?? BEST EMPLOYER Brand Awards ??2021 & ??ILVER STEVIE AWARDS??for ??REAT EMPLOYERS??Recipient of Common Sense Advisory Award ??Top 75 Global Language Service Providers in the World. Recipient of HRAI Award for Most Innovative L&D Program & HRAI Award for Outstanding Employee Engagement Strategy Recognized as Top 10 Pharma & Life Science Tech Solution Providers by APAC CIOoutlook Recipient of Top 100 Award for 100 Most Promising Companies Connect with us on, LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter & Instagram to stay updated with the latest developments -  https://www.crimsoni.com/  Job Description Interested candidate can share resume at chaital.shah@crimsoni.com

column2: The role of  Executive/Sr. Executive - Recruitment  would require the candidate to gain a comprehensive understanding of Academic Consulting vertical in higher educational segment. As this core recruitment role is centred around E-learning industry, the recruiter must be interested in enhancing holistic understanding of various subject/functional domains and acquiring actionable knowledge about various aspects of E-learning industry in a fast paced manner. PLEASE DO NOT APPLY IF YOU ARE NOT READY FOR AN OFFICE BASED ROLE IN NOIDA. ALSO, PLEASE NOTE THAT THE SELECTION PROCESS IS ONLY CONDUCTED AT OUR OFFICE PREMISES IN NOIDA.  The candidate would also be responsible for designing and executing targeted recruitment strategies, conducting recruitment processes and will get 360 degree exposure to the complete recruitment life cycle. 1. Establishing clear recruitment goals by gaining a comprehensive understanding of industry-specific recruitment needs, types of projects and possible sourcing channels. 2. Develop strong project comprehension skills (for both technical as well as nontechnical) with an ability to pin-point expert qualities/ qualifications for completing the same. 3. Learn and master the use of various platforms such as Resdex, Urbanpro, Freelancer and Upwork with an ability to utilize them efficiently in sourcing qualified technical and nontechnical freelance experts. 4. Working tirelessly to source freelance experts for typical projects/subject domains for which experts are not readily available for academic research.  5. Continuously striving to meet or exceed clearly provided monthly recruitment targets. 6. Being completely responsible for maintaining strong and positive candidate/applicant relations and managing issues pertaining to grievances, timely delivery of selection tests and other resolving queries. 7. Consistently devising new recruitment strategies and effectively deploying the same throughout the year for organizations benefit. 8. Systematically reporting recruitment activities undertaken on a daily-basis and diligently working towards improving the recruitment process. 9. Sincerely adhering to professional instructions and guidelines provided by reporting authority. Qualification and Experience  Masters Degree in Management and Related Subjects is preferred. column2: Talent Acquisition Executive (Telecom Industry) Position Overview: We are seeking a talented and driven individual to join our team as a Talent Acquisition Executive. This role is pivotal in ensuring the acquisition of top-tier talent within the dynamic and fast-paced telecom industry. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in talent acquisition, particularly within the telecom sector, with a proven track record of sourcing, attracting, and retaining high-caliber professionals. Key Responsibilities: 1. Collaborate with hiring managers to understand staffing needs and develop effective recruitment strategies tailored to the telecom industry's demands. 2. Utilize various channels, including job boards, social media platforms, and professional networks, to source and attract qualified candidates. 3. Conduct initial screening interviews to assess candidate qualifications, skills, and cultural fit with the organization. 4. Manage the end-to-end recruitment process, including scheduling interviews, coordinating assessments, and facilitating hiring decisions. 5. Build and maintain strong relationships with candidates, ensuring a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment lifecycle. 6. Partner with internal stakeholders to implement innovative recruitment initiatives and programs aimed at enhancing the employer brand within the telecom sector. 7. Stay abreast of industry trends, market insights, and competitor activities to inform recruitment strategies and maintain a competitive edge in talent acquisition. 8. Track recruitment metrics and analyze data to evaluate the effectiveness of recruitment efforts and identify areas for improvement. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 2. Proven experience in talent acquisition, preferably within the telecom industry. 3. In-depth knowledge of recruitment best practices, techniques, and tools. 4. Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to effectively engage with candidates and stakeholders at all levels. 5. Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment. 6. Results-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality talent within tight deadlines. 7. Proficiency in applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other recruitment software. 8. Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and business needs. 9. Certification in HR or talent acquisition (e.g., PHR, SHRM-CP) is a plus. Join our team and be part of an exciting journey in shaping the future of talent acquisition within the telecom industry!

column2: About SRG HOUSING FINANCE LIMITED(NSE Listed) ?SRG HOUSING FINANCE LIMITED, (SRGHFL) is a Listed Housing Finance Company registered under the Companies Act, 1956. The Company was incorporated on 10th March, 1999, with the Registrar of Companies, Jaipur in the name of VITALISE FINLEASE PRIVATE LIMITED with an object to provide of housing finance. The promoters had their efforts to start the business and with the vision to create a brand image of the company, changed its name and subsequently converted it to Public Limited Company as SRG HOUSING FINANCE LTD. The company started its business operation after getting license from National Housing Bank. The Promoters further listed SRGHFL at SME Platform of BSE on September 11, 2012 through its Initial Public Offer. Further the company got migrated to Main Board of BSE Limited w.e.f. 04.02.2015 being :? THE FIRST COMPANY IN INDIA TO GET MIGRATED FROM BSE SME PLATFORM TO BSE MAIN BOARD.? At present, the company is exclusively dealing with the housing loans and having wide number of customers. The company is providing home loans for construction, additions, alterations, repair & renovation, which has been declared the priority sector lending by the Reserve Bank of India.  We service for :  a. Individual Home Loans?b. Loan against property?c. Builder's loan? column2: Karbon Card  is a business credit card for Indian entrepreneurs and corporate leaders. We are on a mission to simplify payment for our customers.Launched in 2019, Karbon Card became an instant hit among Bangalore tech founders. In 2021, Karbon graduated from Y-Combinator among the top growth picks, and closed a $12M pre-A round in September.Karbon now proudly serves 1500+ corps, tech giants, and SMEs, all across India, and grows rapidly. Job Description: Sourcing Candidates: Utilizing various methods such as job boards, social media, networking, referrals, and other online platforms to find potential candidates for open positions. Screening and Assessment: Reviewing resumes, conducting initial interviews, and evaluating candidates' skills, qualifications, and cultural fit. Interviewing: Coordinating and conducting interviews with candidates, both in-person and via video conferencing. Collaborating with hiring managers to assess candidates' suitability for specific roles. Applicant Tracking: Utilizing applicant tracking systems (ATS) to manage candidate pipelines, update candidate statuses, and maintain accurate records. Candidate Experience: Ensuring a positive and smooth candidate experience throughout the hiring process, providing timely feedback, and addressing candidates' questions. Negotiation and Offer Process: Assisting in salary negotiations, presenting job offers, and ensuring a seamless onboarding process for successful candidates. Market Research: Staying updated on industry trends, salary benchmarks, and talent acquisition best practices to improve recruitment strategies. Compliance: Ensuring that the recruitment process adheres to relevant labor laws and company policies. Qualifications and Requirements: A bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field is preferred, but not mandatory. Prior experience in recruitment, talent acquisition, or HR is typically desirable. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with candidates and hiring managers. Ability to effectively manage multiple job openings and candidates simultaneously. A results-oriented and proactive approach to meet recruitment goals and deadlines

column2: As a Senior Associate, you ll work as part of a team of problem solvers, helping to solve complex business issues from strategy to execution. PwC Professional skills and responsibilities for this management level include but are not limited to:        Use feedback and reflection to develop self-awareness, personal strengths and address development areas.      Delegate to others to provide stretch opportunities and coach to help deliver results.      Develop new ideas and propose innovative solutions to problems.      Use a broad range of tools and techniques to extract insights from current trends in business area.      Review your work and that of others for quality, accuracy and relevance.      Share relevant thought leadership.      Use straightforward communication, in a structured way, when influencing others.      Able to read situations and modify behavior to build quality, diverse relationships.      Uphold the firm s code of ethics and business conduct.          ?       Preferred Knowledge/Skills:           ?     Demonstrates working-level knowledge of, and/or proven record of success with lateral or experienced recruiting/sourcing strategy development and execution, preferably for a global network of professional services firms, including the following areas:          a. Understanding and utilizing recruiting systems, technologies and protocols; b. Collaborating with sourcing professionals, hiring leaders, and business stakeholders;      c. Contributing to full candidate life-cycle candidate recruitment and relationship building;        Demonstrates some ability and related functional know-how to drive the following results related to the firms lateral/experienced recruiting lifecycle, including the following areas: -      a. Contributing to the development of pan India business unit experienced recruiting strategy for assigned requisitions;      b. Maintaining pipeline reports and presenting regular updates to key stakeholders;      c. Identifying and recommending candidates, coordinating interview scheduling, negotiating offers, and bringing the candidate recruiting process to closure;      d. Building working relationships with local partners, staff, and HR colleagues related to recruiting efforts;      e. Managing and updating the experienced applicant tracking system, for candidate progression in the interview process on a real-time basis;      f. Supporting pan India Recruiting Manager(s) with requisitions, as needed;      g. Managing unsolicited and generic referrals as needed;      h. Managing special projects at the pan India level;      i. Responding to routine recruiting-related questions from partners, staff, candidates, and new hires; and,      j. Providing coaching and guidance to recruiting associates as needed. Prior experience of performing roles within a business in the professional services industry is preferred.          ?     Demonstrates thorough level knowledge of and proven ability to contribute consistently and positively in a high-paced, changing work environment, emphasizing the ability to prioritize multiple functions and tasks, as well as manage time efficiently in a recruiting/research role, which includes, but is not limited to, the following areas:      ?     a. Contributing to the development of pan India business unit experienced recruiting strategies for assigned requisitions;      b. Conducting in-depth searches to find targeted candidate populations, including computer search, job board web research techniques, networking and cold calling/phone research and utilizing social media;      c. Performing deep web sourcing, utilizing advanced filtering and Boolean search strings, and database mining;      d. Tracking industry trends and developments, including information on competitors to include analyzing talent trends and hiring developments within sectors to bring value added insight and perspective to internal stakeholders;      e. Managing and updating the experienced applicant tracking system and the candidate relationship manager, for candidate progression in the interview process on a real-time basis; and,      f. Supporting special projects at the pan India level.          Technical capability      Key personal attribute Minimum Degree Required: Bachelor s degree/ Specialization in Human Resources is an added advantage Minimum Years of          Experience    : 5-9 year(s)

column2: Position: HR Recruiter Be a part of growing Team! Hiring now HR Recruiter for Arpanna Group in Mumbai Job Summary: The HR Recruiter plays a crucial role in the organization's talent acquisition process by identifying, sourcing, and attracting top-tier candidates for various positions. The recruiter works closely with hiring managers and other stakeholders to understand staffing needs and ensure the recruitment process is efficient and effective. Key Responsibilities: Job Analysis and Planning: Collaborate with hiring managers to understand job requirements and qualifications. Conduct job analyses to determine key skills, knowledge, and abilities needed for each position. Develop and update job descriptions and specifications. Sourcing and Networking: Utilize various sourcing methods, including online job boards, social media, professional networks, and referrals. Build and maintain a network of potential candidates through proactive outreach. Attend job fairs, industry events, and networking activities to expand candidate pipelines. Screening and Selection: Review resumes and applications to identify potential candidates. Conduct initial phone or video screenings to assess candidate qualifications and cultural fit. Coordinate and participate in interviews with hiring managers. Interview Coordination: Schedule and coordinate interviews between candidates and hiring teams. Provide timely and constructive feedback to candidates. Ensure a positive and professional candidate experience throughout the recruitment process. Offer Negotiation and On boarding: Extend job offers to selected candidates. Negotiate salary and other employment terms. Collaborate with the HR team to facilitate the on boarding process for new hires. Data Management and Reporting: Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records. Generate and analyze recruitment metrics and reports. Identify areas for process improvement and implement best practices. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience as an HR recruiter or in a similar role. Strong knowledge of recruitment processes, techniques, and best practices. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Competencies: Strong organizational and time-management skills. Ability to work independently and collaboratively. Adaptability and flexibility in a dynamic work environment. Confidentiality and ethical behaviour in handling sensitive information. Interested candidates can share resume on hrd@arpanna.com/ smitha@arpanna.com

They develop a comprehensive understanding of the desired competencies, qualifications, and cultural fit for executive positions. Sourcing Strategies: They employ various sourcing strategies to identify potential executive candidates. This may include targeted executive search firms, professional networks, industry events, referrals, and online platforms. They proactively build relationships with high-potential candidates and maintain a talent pipeline for future executive roles. Candidate Evaluation: Executive Talent Acquisition professionals employ rigorous assessment methods to evaluate candidates' suitability for executive positions. This may involve interviews, behavioral assessments, leadership evaluations, reference checks, and background screenings. They assess candidates' leadership capabilities, strategic thinking, communication skills, and cultural fit with the organization. Executive Search Process: They manage the end-to-end executive search process, which includes defining the search criteria, conducting candidate screenings, coordinating interviews with key stakeholders, and facilitating the decision-making process. They act as a liaison between candidates, internal teams, and external search firms to ensure a smooth recruitment experience. Employer Branding and Value Proposition: Executive Talent Acquisition professionals play a crucial role in representing the organization's employer brand and value proposition to prospective executive candidates. They effectively communicate the company's vision, culture, growth opportunities, and unique selling points to attract top-tier talent.
column11: sourcing, employer branding, shortlisting, head hunting, leadership hiring, hiring, executive search, interview coordination, job posting, sourcing profiles, it recruitment, strategic thinking, recruitment, referrals, compensation

Screening and Selection:  Review resumes, conduct initial screenings, and coordinate interviews with the Territory Sales Incharge / Area Sales Managers / Regional Sales Managers to identify candidates who meet the business requirements and cultural fit of the organization . 4.  Candidate Management:  Manage the candidate experience throughout the recruitment  process, ensuring clear communication, timely feedback, and a positive impression of the company.  5.  Operational Support:  Provide operational support required for engagement with the hired talent. This can include (but not limited to) event planning and inducting by giving walkthrough of applicable policies and procedures.  6.  Collaboration:  Partner closely with hiring managers to understand their needs, provide insights on market trends, and facilitate the selection process to make informed hiring decisions. 7.  Compliance:  Ensure compliance with the internal hiring policy, as well as all the relevant laws and regulations governing recruitment and hiring processes. 8.  Reporting:  Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of recruitment activities, including candidate status, pipeline metrics, and hiring trends. Direct reporting will be to the Zonal Sales Director for the North 1 zone, with administrative reporting to the National Sales Human Resource Lead. 9.  Continuous Improvement:  Identify opportunities for process improvements and implement best practices to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the recruitment function. Minimum Qualifications - Postgraduate degree in human resources or related field. - 4-5 years of experience in talent acquisition, with a focus on hiring Sales professionals in the FMCG/OTC sector. - Willingness to travel within the designated region as needed. - Proven track record of successfully recruiting for similar roles in a fast-paced environment. - Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels. - Excellent communication and negotiation skills. Preferred Qualifications: - Experience working in the FMCG/OTC industry or a similar fast-paced consumer goods environment. - Knowledge of local market dynamics and talent trends in the North 1 zone (States mentioned in position overview) - Certification or training in recruitment and selection techniques

To be successful in this role, you should be able to develop long-term recruiting strategies and nurture trusting relationships with potential hires.   Ultimately, you will create strong talent pipelines for our company s current and future hiring needs.       Responsibilities:           Coordinate with hiring/team managers in India and abroad to identify staffing needs   Constantly be in the loop with team managers update the status and information about the entire hiring process   Handle multiple requirements on software, digital and mechanical engineering domain.   Determine selection criteria   Plan interview and selection procedures, including screening calls, assessments and in-person interviews   Design job descriptions and interview questions that reflect each position s requirements   Lead employer branding initiatives               Requirements:       3 to 5 years of experience   Immediate Joiners preferred   Proven work experience as a Talent Acquisition Specialist or similar role with recruiting for Mechanical / Aerospace / Automotive / Digital domains   Hands-on experience with full-cycle recruiting using various interview techniques and evaluation methods   Excellent verbal and written communication skills   A keen understanding of the differences between various roles within the organization   Hybrid work model at our Bangalore office (Mahadevpura, near Whitefield)

column2: Key Responsibilities: Recruitment Strategy Development:  Collaborate with senior management to understand hiring needs and develop comprehensive recruitment strategies aligned with organizational goals. Candidate Sourcing:  Utilize a variety of sourcing techniques, including job boards, social media, networking, referrals, and industry events, to identify and attract qualified candidates. Screening and Selection:  Conduct initial screenings to assess candidate qualifications, skills, and cultural fit. Coordinate interviews with hiring managers and facilitate the selection process. Talent Pipeline Management:  Build and maintain a talent pipeline of potential candidates for current and future hiring needs. Develop relationships with passive candidates and nurture candidate interest in Zell Education. Employer Branding:  Represent Zell Education as an employer of choice by promoting our brand and values through various channels, including social media, job fairs, and industry events. Candidate Experience:  Ensure a positive and seamless candidate experience throughout the recruitment process, from initial contact to onboarding. Data Analysis and Reporting:  Track key recruitment metrics, analyze hiring trends, and provide regular reports to management to inform decision-making and optimize recruitment strategiess.
column11: Recruitment, Sourcing Profiles, Talent Sourcing, Talent Acquisition

column2: Position Overview: The HR Recruiter plays a critical role in the recruitment process by identifying, attracting, and evaluating candidates to ensure the organization's staffing needs are met. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a deep understanding of both the company's culture and the requirements of the positions being filled. Key Responsibilities: Talent Sourcing: Utilize various sourcing methods (e.g., job boards, social media, professional networks, referrals) to identify potential candidates. Build and maintain a network of potential candidates through proactive outreach and networking activities. Monitor industry trends and competitor activity to stay informed of best practices and new sourcing channels. Screening and Evaluation: Review resumes and applications to assess candidate qualifications and suitability for open positions. Conduct initial phone screenings to evaluate candidate fit, qualifications, and interest in the role. Coordinate and conduct interviews, both in-person and virtually, ensuring a positive candidate experience throughout the process. Assess candidates' skills, experience, and cultural fit through a combination of interviews, assessments, and reference checks. Candidate Management: Provide timely and constructive feedback to candidates throughout the recruitment process. Manage candidate pipelines and maintain accurate records in the applicant tracking system (ATS). Coordinate interview schedules and logistics for both candidates and hiring managers. Ensure compliance with relevant laws and regulations regarding recruitment and selection processes. Collaborative Partner: Collaborate closely with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and develop tailored recruitment strategies. Provide guidance and support to hiring managers on best practices for interviewing, candidate selection, and offer negotiation. Build strong relationships with internal stakeholders to effectively advocate for candidates and align recruitment efforts with organizational goals. Continuous Improvement: Analyze recruitment metrics and trends to identify opportunities for process improvement and efficiency. Stay informed of industry trends and emerging technologies to enhance recruitment strategies. Participate in recruitment-related projects and initiatives aimed at enhancing the overall candidate experience and employer brand. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience in recruitment, either in-house or with a recruitment agency. Strong understanding of recruitment best practices, including sourcing strategies, candidate assessment techniques, and employment laws. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build rapport with candidates and stakeholders at all levels. Highly organized with strong attention to detail and the ability to manage multiple priorities simultaneously. Proficiency in applicant tracking systems (ATS) and other recruitment tools/software. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the HR Recruiter role. Duties and responsibilities may be subject to change based on organizational needs and priorities.
column11: Recruitment Management, Recruitment

column2: As an Executive - Talent Acquisition, your primary responsibility is to attract, source, and recruit top talent to meet the organization's staffing needs     You will play a critical role in the talent acquisition process, from sourcing candidates to conducting interviews and facilitating the hiring process       Here is a comprehensive job description for an Executive - Talent Acquisition:       Recruitment Strategy and Planning:Collaborate with hiring managers and stakeholders to understand staffing needs and develop recruitment strategies     Conduct job analysis and create job descriptions and specifications for open positions     Develop and implement effective sourcing strategies to attract a diverse pool of qualified candidates     Stay updated with industry trends, recruitment best practices, and innovative sourcing techniques     Candidate Sourcing and Screening:Source candidates through various channels, including job portals, social media, professional networks, and referrals     Review resumes, assess candidate qualifications, and conduct initial screening to shortlist potential candidates     Conduct phone or video interviews to evaluate candidate suitability and assess their skills, experience, and cultural fit     Maintain candidate databases and applicant tracking systems (ATS) with accurate and up-to-date candidate information     Interviewing and Selection:Coordinate and schedule interviews with candidates, hiring managers, and interview panels     Conduct in-person or virtual interviews, using behavioral and competency-based interviewing techniques     Evaluate candidate performance, provide feedback, and make recommendations to hiring managers     Facilitate candidate assessments, tests, or exercises to evaluate specific skills or competencies, as required     Relationship Management:Build and maintain relationships with candidates, ensuring a positive candidate experience throughout the recruitment process     Collaborate with hiring managers and stakeholders to establish effective communication and alignment on candidate profiles and requirements     Develop relationships with external recruitment agencies, universities, and professional organizations to source potential candidates

column1: TA Backend Support Shared Services ( Night Shifts)
column2: *  About Us:  VXI is a dynamic and innovative BPO company committed to attracting and  retaining top talent. Our Talent Acquisition team plays a crucial role in ensuring we have  the right people in the right positions to drive our organization forward. We are currently  seeking a talented individual to join our Talent Acquisition Backend Team.  Job Summary:  The Talent Acquisition Backend Specialist will be responsible for managing  various backend processes related to talent acquisition, including background checks,  drug tests, equipment requests, candidate tracking, and administrative support tasks. This  role requires meticulous attention to detail, excellent organizational skills, and the ability  to collaborate effectively with internal teams.  Key   Responsibilities:  1. Process Background Checks, I-9, and Drug Tests: o Efficiently handle the processing of background checks, I-9 forms, and drug tests  for VXI successful candidates. o Ensure all necessary documentation is collected and processed accurately and in  a timely manner.  2.  Manage Equipment Requests:  o Collaborate with the IT Depot to send equipment requests for new hires,  ensuring they have the necessary tools for their roles.  3.  Update Retrieval Tracker:  o Maintain and update the retrieval tracker by accurately entering the names of  fallout candidates and their relevant information.  4.  Coordinate ID Credentials:  o Send ID credential requests to the ID Admin team for new hires and ensure  timely issuance. o Collaborate with the ID Admin team to cancel credentials for offboarded  candidates.  5.  Candidate Rescheduling:  o Communicate with candidates to reschedule their onboarding sessions or  training classes as needed. o Ensure timely and effective coordination with all stakeholders involved in the  rescheduling process.  6.  Process Drug Tests:  o Facilitate the processing of drug tests for candidates, ensuring compliance with  company policies and procedures. 7.  Assist with Approval Processes:  o Liaise with HR to obtain approvals for background checks and drug tests as  required.  Qualifications: ?? Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field  preferred. ??Proven experience in talent acquisition, HR administration, or related roles. ??Familiarity with background check processes, drug testing procedures, and I-9  verification requirements. ??Strong attention to detail and accuracy in data entry and documentation. ??Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written. ??Ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment. ??Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and HRIS software. ??Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion.  Preferred Qualifications:  ??Previous experience working in a talent acquisition or HR backend support role. ??Knowledge of employment laws and regulations related to hiring processes. ??Experience working with recruitment or HR software platforms  ***Night Shifts***

column1: US Healthcare Recruiter (Noida Sector 62 - Work from office only)
column2: Job Title:  US Healthcare Recruiter Open Positions:  15+ Shift:  7:30 PM to 4:30 AM - IST Work location : Noida, Sector 62 (Work From Office only) Salary range:  Upto 7 LPA + Uncapped Incentives  Everyday Walk-In Interviews: Date:  06-May-2024 to 10th May 2024 (Mon - Fri Only) Timings:  7:30 PM - 10:30 PM IST Walk-In Venue:  Majestic Knowledge Boulevard, Plot: A/8A, 9th Floor, Tower B, Sector 62, Noida - 201301  Nearest Metro:  Electronic city Landmark:  Near IMS Law College  NOTE:  Please carry the latest copy of your Updated resume and reach the interview location. What we offer: 1) Cab pick and drop facility for all the employees  2) Dinner facility for all the employees 3) Comprehensive Medical & Term Life Insurance coverage  4) Cash Bonus on successful placements\ 5) Learning & Development programs 6) Vast Growth opportunities Eligibility criteria: 1) Hands-on experience in US Healthcare Recruitment (Perm/ Travel hiring) 2) Extensive experience in sourcing candidate profiles through Social media, references, Application tracking system etc. 3) Any Bachelor's/ Master's degree 4) Wanted for night shifts (Work timings: 7:30 PM - 4:30 AM IST) Role and Responsibilities: 1. Collaborate with BDM's to understand their hiring needs and preferences. 2. Source, identify, and engage top-quality candidates for US non-IT/Finance positions. 3. Conduct in-depth screening and probe the right questions to understand the candidate's profile and assess them by probing to evaluate candidates' skills and qualifications. 4. Collaborate closely with hiring managers to understand job requirements, skills, and qualifications needed for each role. 5. Conduct comprehensive candidate searches through various databases, social media platforms, and professional networks. 6. Employ creative sourcing strategies to identify passive candidates and build a strong talent pipeline. Note:  Please send your updated resume to the below email IDs if you are interested in the job opportunity. surajit.hazarika@protouchstaffing.com  ekta.suri@protouchstaffing.com  Welcome to W3Global (www.w3global.com) - Your Pathway to Perfect Staffing At W3Global, we stand at the forefront of staffing excellence, committed to a singular mission: streamlining the recruitment journey to connect the ideal candidate with the perfect role, precisely when it's needed. Established in the year 2006, we have grown into a trailblazing staffing entity, with an expansive footprint across 6 countries (USA, Canada, UK, India, Poland, and Australia) and growing and a resounding global presence that echoes from our headquarters in Frisco, Texas. Over the past 15+ years, we've undergone an extraordinary evolution, transcending our humble beginnings of just four individuals to blossom into a dynamic team of 800+ employees. This journey has propelled us into a prominent role as premier providers of recruitment and staffing solutions across a spectrum of industries, ranging from IT, accounting/finance, legal, engineering, government, and human resources, all the way to executive staffing. Our dedication is clear: placing people in positions where they thrive. Our Path of Growth: 2022: Synectics - A pivotal year as we welcomed Synectics, Inc. into the W3Global family. This strategic acquisition brought aboard a distinguished staffing and recruitment powerhouse headquartered in Chicago. 2018: Protouch Staffing (Healthcare) - In 2018, our reach extended further with the acquisition of Protouch Staffing, a specialized force in healthcare staffing solutions. Protouch started back in 1989 in TX, focused on employing qualified nurses, Physical therapists, and other healthcare professionals specializing in Permanent, Temporary, Per-diem and Travel staffing across the United States. 2017: TalentPathway - A significant milestone in 2017, the birth of TalentPathway (TP), which opened new avenues through an advanced ATS (Advanced Tracking System), charting the path to seamless recruitment. 2006: W3Global - Our inception year, 2006, marked the creation of W3Global, initially focused on delivering workforce solutions for both IT and non-IT clients. Spanning the Globe: Our presence resonates across the world, encompassing key regions such as the USA, Canada, UK, India, Poland, and Australia and growing. This global reach positions us as a bridge connecting talent and opportunity on an international scale. Embrace the W3Global advantage, where every step is a stride toward simplified staffing solutions. Experience staffing reimagined - because placing individuals in their ultimate work roles is not just our commitment, it's our passion.

column2: We are seeking an experienced HR Recruiter to join our team.  The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 1 year of experience in recruitment and be well-versed with all major job portals available in India, including Naukri and Shine.  The HR Recruiter will play a pivotal role in sourcing, screening, and selecting qualified candidates to fill various positions within the organization. Responsibilities: Utilize online job portals, social media platforms, and other channels to source potential candidates. Conduct initial screenings to assess candidate qualifications, skills, and fit for specific roles. Coordinate with hiring managers to understand their staffing needs and requirements. Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records in the applicant tracking system. Build and maintain a pipeline of qualified candidates for current and future job openings. Implement best practices for candidate engagement and experience throughout the recruitment process. Collaborate with the HR team to streamline recruitment processes and improve efficiency. Stay updated on industry trends and innovative sourcing techniques to attract top talent. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field. Minimum of 1 year of experience in recruitment, preferably in a similar industry. Proven track record of sourcing and attracting candidates through online platforms. Excellent knowledge of major job portals like Naukri, Shine, and other relevant recruitment tools. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities effectively. Detail-oriented with a focus on delivering high-quality results. Familiarity with applicant tracking systems and other HR software is a plus. Connect: 9990890599

Takes initiative to develop own technical / behavioral skills; reflects and learns from experiences of self and others. ??Is receptive to new ideas and different perspectives, Questions routine/ procedures that do not seem efficient and can be improved.   Adapts to other cultures and unfamiliar situations, thinks on the feet & displays sense of urgency for completion of deliverables.   Encourages teamwork and collaboration by promoting openness and dialogue, facilitates participation of self and other team members in organizational decisions and motivates other team members and drives pride and positivity in work. Displays excellent verbal and written communication skills and interpersonal skills required to interact with colleagues including customer, hiring managers, manpower vendors, supervisors and team members. column2: Skill required:  Talent Acquisition - Talent Sourcing Designation:  Talent Connector Associate Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 2 to 5 years  Language - Ability: English - Proficient  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song all powered by the worlds largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? Managing Sourcing & Screening service delivery module framework for clients. Develop and implement a healthy source mix hiring strategy with an emphasis on direct sourcing Recruited employees across various domains encompassing majorly Engineering/Manufacturing/Oil & Gas Industry Innovate and Identify improvement Opportunities to optimize the recruitment process decrease cost and increase client value. Present weekly, monthly and Quarterly dashboards to TA stakeholders and clients through MIS reports. o Flag risks to Clients and Stakeholders by proposing actions plansCandidates with End to End Recruitment experience - Domestic/International MarketYou will be part of a HR sourcing team which will enable to search and identify the right candidates to ensure the delivery of candidates to meet the recruiting demand based on the Recruiting Plan What are we looking for? Results orientation Adaptable and flexible Ability to perform under pressure Ability to establish strong client relationship Detail orientation  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments The decisions that you make would impact your own work You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation

Strategic responsibilities: - Utilize& Manage applicant tracking system for internal records and daily updates. column2: Job Title:   HR Intern Location:  Saltlake, Sector V, Kolkata. Duration:  6-month internship program Stipend:  INR 6,000 - 7,000 per month About the Company:  Innovel Energy Services Pvt Ltd was founded with a vision to be a leading provider of renewable energy solutions. Our integrated energy solutions undertook numerous initiatives to strengthen our quality paradigm checks, including end-to-end services from requirement analysis, design, implementation, and installation maintenance. Energy being our core expertise, we have diversified into smart metering and are executing projects worth around 1250 crores at present. Our solution provider team is continuously working to introduce innovative technical & digital solutions for our internal & external stakeholders and are executing advanced applications for Smart metering  a new generation technology being introduced in India towards error free billing and reduction of T&D losses to save time, money and effort. Key Responsibilities: Assist in full-time recruitment, with a focus on hiring store technicians across India and mid-level resources for corporate positions. Source candidates through various channels such as job portals, social media, and employee referrals. Screen resumes and conduct initial phone screens to ensure candidates meet job requirements. Coordinate with hiring managers to schedule interviews and assist in the interview process. Assist in the onboarding process for new hires. Requirements: Pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's degree in Human Resources or related field. Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal. Strong organizational and time-management skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint). Benefits: Opportunity to gain hands-on experience in recruitment and human resources. Mentorship from experienced HR professionals. Possibility of a full-time employment offer based on performance during the internship. How to Apply:  Interested candidates can share their updated CVs and Cover Letter to debajyoti.paul@innovelenergy.com. Note:  Preference will be given to female candidates for this position.

column2: Position: Recruitment Trainee Job Location:  Noida Job Type:  Full-time Duration:   Training Period: 3 months; Permanent Position thereafter Salary during Training Period:  8,000- 10,000 INR per month Salary after Training:  15,000 to 25,000 INR per month (based on performance) Job Responsibilities: Learn and understand the recruitment process under the guidance of senior recruiters. Source potential candidates through various channels such as job portals, social media, referrals, etc. Screen resumes and conduct initial interviews to assess candidate suitability. Assist in coordinating interviews between candidates and clients. Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of candidate information and recruitment activities. Collaborate with team members to ensure timely and efficient execution of recruitment      assignments. Adhere to company policies, procedures, and ethical standards throughout the recruitment process. Continuously seek opportunities for learning and self-improvement in the field of      recruitment. Eligibility Criteria: Graduates from any discipline are eligible to apply. MBA in HR or related field is preferred but not mandatory. Selection Process: Written Test: Assessing candidates' basic aptitude and communication skills. Face-to-Face Interview:  Evaluating candidates' knowledge of recruitment concepts, motivation, and  suitability for the role. Desired Skills and Qualities: Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work effectively in a team environment. Excellent organizational and time management skills. Keen attention to detail and accuracy. Enthusiasm to learn and grow in the field of recruitment. Benefits: Comprehensive training program to build a strong foundation in recruitment. Opportunity for career advancement based on performance. Competitive salary package with attractive incentives. Exposure to diverse industries and clients, enhancing professional development. Join us and embark on an exciting journey to kick start your career in recruitment! If you possess the passion and drive to succeed in this dynamic field, we welcome you to apply for the position of Recruitment Trainee at afflatus HR Services  To apply, please send your updated resume along with a cover letter highlighting your interest and suitability for the role to -  hr@afflatushr.com We look forward to welcoming talented individuals who share our commitment to excellence and teamwork. Note:  Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further rounds of the selection process.

column2: About Taggd: Taggd is a digital recruitment platform that provides Ready-to-Hire talent to India Inc. Combining the power of human knowledge and data, Taggd has successfully fulfilled talent mandates of more than 100+ clients and ensured hiring managers success for half a million jobs from over 14+ sectors. With a vision to fulfill 1 million Jobs through our talent platform by 2025, we strive to connect people with people, people with companies, and people with opportunities. Just right. Every time. For more information pls visit www.taggd.in. About the Position: Role: Senior Recruitment Associate Job Location: Talegaon Dabhade, Pune Reporting to: Manager RPO Working Days: 6 days(Monday- Friday-Regular, Saturdays will be WFH). About the Role: At Taggd, our people are our most important resource. Were looking for a highly skilled recruiter to become one of them, and to help us find them. The ideal candidate will have prior experience in recruitment or talent acquisition, with knowledge ofscreening, interviewing, and hiring practices. If you have a passion for finding untapped talent, driving company growth, and helping individuals find promising careers, we want to hear from you. Daily & Weekly Responsibilities:  Work closely with managers to gain a comprehensive understanding of the clients hiring   needs for each position and meet competitive hiring goals and expectations.  Manage the full recruiting lifecycle across a variety of open roles helping management find,   hire, and retain quality talent.  Work and form relationships with internal management teams to know the ins and outs of   their departments and better understand their hiring needs and job specifications.  Develop and release job postings on a platform, such as social media and job boards.  Utilize knowledge of multiple recruiting sources and execute innovative recruiting strategies   to find quality candidates and prospect for new business.  Screen resumes and prospects, qualify, interview, and manage candidates throughout   interview process from prepping before interviews to assisting with final offer negotiation.  Maintain a database of candidate records, including active and passive prospects, hired, and   fired employees, and other candidate relationships.  Follow up on interview process status and update records in internal database. Job Requirements: Education: Any Graduate/Postgraduate (MBA) Experience: 3-5 Years Industry - Automobile/Automotive/Manufacturing Desired Competencies:  Excellent Written and Oral Communication (Must Have)  Should have end-to-end recruitment experience.  Should have experience in Sourcing and Recruiting for Non-IT industry.  Stakeholder Management experience Mid-Senior level, Global.  Strong knowledge of professional network and job portals usage (Must Have)  Head Hunting Skills (Must have) ??Positive attitude towards work (Must Have)  Ability and willingness to keep oneself updated of various developments in non-IT industry &   latest technologies (Must Have)  Experience of engaging specialized, high-skilled, or difficult-to-attract talent.  High target and delivery orientation (Must Have)  Advanced knowledge of MS Office, database management (ATS), and Boolean/advanced   searches (Must Have)

column2: Dear Candidate,  I hope this email finds you well.  I am thrilled to present you with an exciting career opportunity to work with: The second-largest steel producer in the world Organization is among the top Fortune Global 200 ranking of the world's largest corporation The organization's employee base is over 2,00,000 employees You have an opportunity to serve this global customer as part of our Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) model. Taggd (www.taggd.in) is the largest RPO organization in India and we provide innovative Talent solutions, offering top-notch services to clients around the world. Our RPO model allows us to partner with prestigious 100+ global customers, streamlining their recruitment processes, and ensuring they hire the best talent to drive their success.  Position:  Senior Recruitment Associate - RPO Location : Pune  Industry:  Manufacturing and Steel and Automotive and Automobile and Oil&Gas Reporting   to:  Manager RPO.  Working   Days : 5 days, work from the office (Monday- Friday) You will be a full time employee of Taggd (www.taggd.in) and will be deputed on a customer location Key Responsibilities: As a full-time employee of Taggd and member of the RPO Team, you will play a crucial role in supporting this global esteemed customer's recruitment needs. Your responsibilities will include: As a Recruiter for the Manufacturing and Steel Industry, you will play a crucial role in sourcing, attracting, and hiring top talent to support the growth and success of our organization.  Your responsibilities will include managing the end-to-end recruitment process, collaborating with hiring managers, and ensuring a seamless candidate experience.  This role demands a deep understanding of the manufacturing and steel industry and the ability to identify and engage with candidates possessing the right skill sets and expertise. Key responsibilities include building a robust talent pipeline through various channels, conducting thorough candidate screenings, collaborating with hiring managers to understand their needs, and executing effective recruitment strategies for engineering and non-engineering roles.  You will be responsible to enhance the employer brand, coordinate technical interviews, ensure a positive candidate experience, stay updated on industry trends, and maintain accurate candidate records while ensuring compliance with laws and company policies throughout the recruitment process. CTQs: Minimum of 5 years of experience in Non -IT recruitment.  Proven experience as a Recruiter, preferably in the manufacturing and steel industry or a related sector. In-depth knowledge of the IT, manufacturing and steel industry's job market and skill requirements. Familiarity with applicant tracking systems and other recruitment software. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively engage with candidates and hiring managers. Excellent negotiation and persuasion abilities to close offers successfully. Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines while maintaining attention to detail. Demonstrated problem-solving skills and adaptability in a fast-paced environment. Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. How RPO role will help in my career? By becoming a part of our RPO Team, you will gain exposure to the dynamic world of multiple industries. Working closely with our esteemed customers, you will have the opportunity to shape the talent landscape and contribute to their continued success. As an organization, we foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and professional growth. Our team members are our most valuable assets, and we are committed to providing a supportive environment that encourages personal development and work-life balance. Isnt exciting? Here is the process: If you find this opportunity intriguing and feel that your qualifications match our requirements, we would be thrilled to receive your updated resume. The selection process involves three interview rounds, followed by an HR discussion. To increase your chances of being shortlisted for this role, we encourage you to refresh your domain knowledge in manufacturing, steel, or your specific area of expertise. Should you have any inquiries or need additional information about the role, Taggd, or our esteemed customer, please feel free to reach out to us. We are here to support and guide you through the process. We look forward to potentially welcoming you aboard and embarking on this exciting journey together! We look forward to work together to deliver exceptional recruitment solutions on a global scale. Thank you for considering this opportunity.  We wish you the best of luck in your career endeavors. Regards Anmol Shreya  anmol.shreya@taggd.in

column2: Job Title:  HR Recruiter - International Voice Process (BPO) Location:  Devanahalli, Bangalore Experience:  3 to 5 years Notice Period:  Up to 15 days Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled HR Recruiter with 3 to 5 years of experience, specializing in hiring for non-IT BPO profiles, particularly those related to international voice process. This role is based in Devanahalli, Bangalore, with a notice period of up to 15 days. The ideal candidate should have experience in HR Business Partner (HRBP) activities and stakeholder management, along with operations-related recruitment. Key Responsibilities: Recruitment Strategy: Develop and execute recruitment strategies to attract top talent for international voice process roles and other BPO-related positions. Bulk Hiring: Manage and execute bulk hiring activities, with the ability to close 30 to 40 profiles within set timelines. Sourcing: Utilize various sourcing methods, including job portals, social media, networking, and employee referrals, to identify and engage potential candidates. Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with hiring managers and other stakeholders to understand hiring requirements and ensure alignment with business objectives. Candidate Screening: Screen resumes, conduct initial interviews, and coordinate subsequent interview rounds to ensure a smooth recruitment process. Operational Support: Assist with basic operational activities related to recruitment and HR processes. Required Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field. 3 to 5 years of experience in HR recruitment, with a focus on non-IT BPO profiles, especially international voice process roles. Proven experience in bulk hiring and closing a high volume of profiles within tight deadlines. Strong knowledge of recruitment best practices and talent acquisition techniques. Excellent communication  and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build relationships with stakeholders. Experience with HRBP activities and stakeholder management is a plus. column2: Job Title: Recruiter Location: Salt lake, Kolkata, Sector V Salary: 8000 - 15000 per month work from office Experience: 6 month - 1 year in recruitment Job Description: We are seeking an experienced and motivated HR Recruiter to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 6 months of hands-on experience in recruiting, with a strong understanding of the end-to-end recruitment process. As an HR Recruiter, you will play a crucial role in sourcing, screening, and selecting qualified candidates to meet the staffing needs of our organization. Responsibilities: Candidate Sourcing: Utilize various channels such as job portals, social media, and professional networks to identify potential candidates. Build and maintain a strong candidate pipeline. Screening and Selection: Review resumes and applications to shortlist candidates based on job requirements. Conduct initial interviews to assess candidates' skills, experience, and cultural fit. Coordinate and schedule interviews with hiring managers. Interview Coordination: Collaborate with hiring managers to understand their specific requirements. Schedule and coordinate interviews, ensuring a smooth and efficient process. Communication and Relationship Building: Maintain effective communication with candidates and internal stakeholders. Provide regular updates to hiring managers on the status of open positions. Documentation and Compliance: Ensure all recruitment processes comply with relevant regulations and company policies. Maintain accurate and up-to-date candidate records in the applicant tracking system. Reporting: Generate regular reports on recruitment metrics and provide insights for continuous improvement. Requirements: Minimum of 6months of experience in recruiting. Proven track record of successfully placing candidates in various roles. Strong understanding of recruitment processes and best practices. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines. Educational Qualification Bachelor Degree Must have own laptop, WIFI, Headphones If you are a passionate and results-driven HR Recruiter looking for a challenging opportunity, we invite you to apply. Please submit your resume along with a cover letter detailing your relevant experience. [careers@gruppentsolutions.com] Note: The location, specific responsibilities, and requirements can be customized based on the organization's needs Employment Type Full-time Job Types: Full-time, Permanent Salary: 8,394.56 - 15,000.00 per month Schedule: Morning shift Ability to commute/relocate: Salt Lake, Kolkata, West Bengal: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Preferred) Application Question(s): Must have own laptop/desktop, WIFI, headphones Experience: Recruiting: 6 month - 1 year (Required) Work Location: In person

column2: The Upstox Story: Upstox is one of India's leading Fin-Tech companies with a mission to simplify trading & investing to make it easily accessible to the masses. We aim to enable everyone, from new investors to seasoned traders, to invest across multiple categories with our state-of-the-art trade & investment platform and commission-free pricing. We offer numerous asset categories to invest in, like Stocks, IPOs, Mutual Funds, and more. By focusing on our customers needs and equipping them with personalised yet powerful tools, we witnessed a steep growth of 800% in our customer base from 25 Thousand in 2017 to 2 Lakh in 2019. With 1500% growth in 2020, currently, over 10 million customers trust us with their investment decisions, thus setting us on the course to become an industry-leader in the country.? Our mission is simple - to break down the complexities of investing and make it more effortless, accessible, affordable, and easy for the masses to adopt. This key principle when infused with intuitive design and leading-edge technology will help us empower every Indian to take control of their investments. RKSV Securities was founded by Ravi Kumar and Shrinivas Viswanath in 2009 and was soon graced by Kavitha Subramanian as the third co-founder in 2016. Backed by Ratan Tata, Upstox had raised $4 million in Series A funding in early 2016 that was led by Kalaari Capital. The Series B funding round scaled multifold and witnessed an investment of $25 million by US-based investment firm - Tiger Global Management in September 2019.? We have a team of highly skilled technology and finance professionals, and are currently looking for highly motivated field experts to be part of our high-energy team.? Here is what you need to know about this role: Job Title:? Senior Associate - Recruitment (Full-time) - Non IT Location:? Mumbai Job description summary: Meet and exceed quarterly and yearly acquisition targets, be able to measure performance goals and metrics, timelines and manage progress Sourcing, recruiting and hiring technical professionals and open to other skill sets (both individual contributors and Management hires) across a wide range of roles Managing the entire hiring process from sourcing through offer acceptance and start providing guidance and support to hiring managers and recruiting team members Participating in implementing and executing recruiting programs and strategies to fill current openings and help build a healthy pipeline of qualified candidates Partnering with other departments (Compensation, Human Resources, stakeholders) to drive the recruiting process through onboarding Able to market map talent across locations, companies and more Meet your team:  You will work closely with the HR Recruitment team, Hiring Managers, Operations team, Payroll team for seamless day-to-day transactions. Your way to impact: Be self-driven / quick starter Have an ownership mindset Aggressively drive and deliver results In your day-to-day role you will: As a Senior Associate - Recruitment, your success will be gauged by your capacity to consistently provide an exceptional candidate experience both internally and externally. Thrive in collaboration and serve as a trusted advisor to hiring managers and leaders. Continuously bring in, evaluate, and present a diverse range of candidates, primarily through direct sourcing, utilising the ATS for candidate pools, engaging with passive candidates, promoting employee referrals, fostering diversity, and employing various sourcing strategies. What do you need to bring? - Bachelors Degree in Human Resources Management or related discipline4+ years experience in HR functions - Exceptional verbal and written communication skills - Possess a high degree of integrity and respect for confidentiality - Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications (Excel, Powerpoint) Work at a fast pace and able to adapt to change quickly - Comfortable presenting to management on various HR initiatives and training others in HR processes, policies and procedures - Ability to understand issues quickly and communicate effectively with employees and management - Be a team player If you fit the above description, we would love to connect with you!  APPLY NOW! Upstox is an Equal Opportunity Employer; all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, veteran status, or other characteristics.

This role involves a diverse range of responsibilities, from talent acquisition and onboarding to learning and development, process improvement, and broader HR functions to ensure the overall success and growth of SignaTech. column2: Karbon Card  is a business credit card for Indian entrepreneurs and corporate leaders. We are on a mission to simplify payment for our customers. Launched in 2019, Karbon Card became an instant hit among Bangalore tech founders. In 2021, Karbon graduated from Y-Combinator among the top growth picks, and closed a $12M pre-A round in September. Karbon now proudly serves 1500+ corps, tech giants, and SMEs, all across India, and grows rapidly. Job Description: Sourcing Candidates: Utilizing various methods such as job boards, social media, networking, referrals, and other online platforms to find potential candidates for open positions. Screening and Assessment: Reviewing resumes, conducting initial interviews, and evaluating candidates' skills, qualifications, and cultural fit. Interviewing: Coordinating and conducting interviews with candidates, both in-person and via video conferencing. Collaborating with hiring managers to assess candidates' suitability for specific roles. Applicant Tracking: Utilizing applicant tracking systems (ATS) to manage candidate pipelines, update candidate statuses, and maintain accurate records. Candidate Experience: Ensuring a positive and smooth candidate experience throughout the hiring process, providing timely feedback, and addressing candidates' questions. Negotiation and Offer Process: Assisting in salary negotiations, presenting job offers, and ensuring a seamless onboarding process for successful candidates. Market Research: Staying updated on industry trends, salary benchmarks, and talent acquisition best practices to improve recruitment strategies. Compliance: Ensuring that the recruitment process adheres to relevant labor laws and company policies. Qualifications and Requirements: A bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business, or a related field is preferred, but not mandatory. Prior experience in recruitment, talent acquisition, or HR is typically desirable. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively interact with candidates and hiring managers. Ability to effectively manage multiple job openings and candidates simultaneously. A results-oriented and proactive approach to meet recruitment goals and deadlines
